metadata.title: CVE-2018-12291 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The on_get_missing_events function in handlers/federation.py in Matrix Synapse before 0.31.1 has a security bug in the get_missing_events federation API where event visibility rules were not applied correctly.

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
